steps.step: Customer selects to register a new account
System prompts for personal details address password newsletter subscription and another custom fields
System requires to confirm Privacy Policy
Customer enters all the information
System creates a new account
System sends a confirmation email to the provided e-mail address
Customer confirms their account
System activates the account and logs the customer in
Customer selects to checkout
System prompts for billing delivery details and payment method
Customer enters the billing delivery details and the payment method
System prompts to agree to the terms and conditions
System shows the summary of the order and requires to confirm the order
Customer confirms the order
System saves the order
The selected products are out of stock
Include
Customer requests to show the order detail
System shows the order detail
Customer wants to reorder a product from the order
System adds the product into cart
Customer selects to use a coupon code
System prompts for the coupon code
Customer enters the coupon code
System applies the coupon code to the order
Customer selects to review a product
System prompts for name review and rating
Customer enters the name the review and the rating
System saves the review
Customer selects to add the product into shopping cart
System prompts for quantity and other product attributes
Customer enters the quantity and the attributes
System saves the product into shopping cart
User selects to remove a product from shopping cart
System removes the product
Include
Customer selects to with the product
System adds the product into the customer's wishlist
Customer selects to show reviews of a product
System show the reviews and ratings of the product
Customer requests to show their wishlist
System shows the wishlist
System allows delete a product from the wishlist and to add concrete products to be added into shopping cart
Customer selects to log in
System prompts for login (email address) and password
Customer enters the login and the password
If the login information are correct system logs customer in
If the login information are incorrect the customer is notified and the use case continues to step 2
Customer selects to subscribe the newsletter
System subscribes the customer to the newsletter
System prompts for the amount of reward points to apply
Customer enters the amount of reward points
System applies the amount of reward points to the order
System decreases customer's amount of reward points
Customer selects to use reward points
System prompts for personal details address payment information and password
System requires to agree to the About us site terms
Customer enters the information and agree to the About us site terms
System creates the affiliate account
System sends a confirmation email to the provided email address
System notifies customer and logs the affiliate account in
Customer selects to create a new affiliate account
Customer selects to estimate shipping and taxes
System prompts for country region and post code
System calculates and shows the estimate shipping and the taxes
System prompts for the preferred shipping method to use on the current order
Customer chooses the preferred shipping method
System saves the preferred shipping method to the current order
Customer enters the country the region and the post code
Customer selects to change password
System prompts for password twice
System checks the entered passwords are the same (are typed correctly)
System saves the password
System notifies about the password requirements
Password is not between 4 and 20 characters
Continue to step 2
Customer enters the password twice
